New Membrane - Cover image editor

New Membrane is here. It's a Mac & Windows app that lets you create album artworks, Facebook covers, YouTube channel arts easily.
Now you're a great designer!

What's new in Membrane 2.0.0:
  • Added beautiful, free photos
  • Added more templates
  • Added new fonts
  • Performance increase
  • Stability improvements
  • Fixed minor issues

Available for Mac and Windows.
Click to download and install.
